participants.name: Marcy Rubin
participants.title: Sr Technical Recruiter at ConsultNet - Salt Lake City, UT (Remote)

messages.message:
Senior DevOps Engineer - Salt Lake City, UT - 16-02657

Hi Brian, 

I bumped into your profile on LinkedIn through some of my connections. 

One of my clients is looking for a talented DevOps Engineer to assist in automating, deploying and supporting SaaS and on premise solutions. This is an agile engineering team that is also going to need extra attention on AWS. 

Your skill-sets seem as if they might align and I was hoping you would be open to a conversation - would you be available to discuss this week?

Perhaps you know of someone your could refer if this opportunity doesn't fit your current goals.

Please contact me to set up a time when we can speak and discuss your background and this position in more detail.


Regards,

Marcy Rubin
Senior Technical Recruiter
ConsultNet
801-997-6223
mrubin@consultnet.com
SKYPE ID: cnmrubin
